    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
      Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
      Creates an SpenSelectionSettingLayout instance with the specified image path and relative layout.
      SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, RelativeLayout relativeLayout, float ratio)
      Deprecated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingSelectionLayout

        public SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context,
                                  String customImagePath,
                                  RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Selection Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Creates an SpenSelectionSettingLayout instance with the specified image path and relative layout.

        The following parameters must be not null.

        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String)
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingSelectionLayout

        @Deprecated
public SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context context,
                                               String customImagePath,
                                               RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                                               float ratio)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated in version 4.0.0. Not supported anymore.
        please use SpenSettingSelectionLayout(Context, String, RelativeLayout).
        Since:
        3.0.0
